name: ChatGPT
description: Advanced AI chatbot for conversations, writing, and problem-solving
detailed_description: ChatGPT is a state-of-the-art conversational AI developed by OpenAI. It can assist with writing, coding, analysis, creative tasks, and much more. The model is trained on diverse internet text and can engage in natural, helpful conversations on a wide range of topics.

name: Midjourney
description: AI-powered image generation from text descriptions
detailed_description: Midjourney is an independent research lab exploring new mediums of thought and expanding the imaginative powers of the human species. Their AI service generates images from textual descriptions, similar to OpenAI's DALL-E and Stable Diffusion.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that helps you write code faster
detailed_description: GitHub Copilot is an AI coding assistant that helps developers write code faster and with less effort. It draws context from comments and code to suggest individual lines and whole functions instantly.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source AI model for generating images from text
detailed_description: Stable Diffusion is a deep learning, text-to-image model released in 2022. It is primarily used to generate detailed images conditioned on text descriptions, though it can also be applied to other tasks such as inpainting, outpainting, and generating image-to-image translations guided by a text prompt.

name: Notion AI
description: AI writing assistant integrated into Notion workspace
detailed_description: Notion AI is an artificial intelligence writing assistant that's built right into Notion. It can help you write, brainstorm, edit, summarize, and more. Whether you're drafting a blog post, creating a project plan, or taking meeting notes, Notion AI can help you work faster and think bigger.

name: Runway ML
description: AI-powered creative tools for video editing and generation
detailed_description: Runway is an applied AI research company shaping the next era of art, entertainment and human creativity. Their suite of AI Magic Tools includes video editing, image generation, and real-time collaboration features.

name: Jasper AI
description: AI content platform for marketing teams and businesses
detailed_description: Jasper is an AI content platform that helps your team create high-quality content 10x faster. From blog posts to marketing copy, Jasper's AI helps you create content that converts.

name: Hugging Face
description: Open-source platform for machine learning models and datasets
detailed_description: Hugging Face is the collaboration platform for the machine learning community. It provides tools to build, train and deploy ML models based on open source code and technologies.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice generation and speech synthesis platform
detailed_description: ElevenLabs is a voice AI research company, developing the most compelling AI speech software for publishers and creators. Their technology enables anyone to create lifelike speech in any voice and style.

name: Tableau AI
description: AI-powered data visualization and analytics platform
detailed_description: Tableau helps people see and understand data. With AI-powered features, Tableau makes it easier to prepare, analyze, and share insights from your data.
